docs.title: Counter-Strike 2 Tactics and Grenade Usage
docs.text:
Welcome to the ultimate guide for Counter-Strike 2 tactics and grenade usage. Here, you'll find detailed strategies and the best spots to use your grenades for each map.

Tactics Grenades Explore detailed strategies and tactics for Mirage including the grenades needed for them. Discover all our grenades for Mirage.

docs.title: for T-Side
docs.text: A-Site Jump Throw Regular Throw Jump Throw Mid-Control Hold "D" + Jump Throw. Don't hold it for too long. crouch Jump Throw. Jump Throw

docs.title: for CT-Side
docs.text: A-Site Hold "D" + Jump Throw. Don't hold it for too long. crouch Jump Throw. Jump Throw Mid-Control Hold "D" + Jump Throw. Don't hold it for too long. crouch Jump Throw. Jump Throw

docs.title: Choose a Map
docs.text: Select a map to view the nades for that map.
